title: Rebecca
description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: The Grapes of Wrath
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

title: The Great Dictator
description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

title: The Philadelphia Story
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

title: Pinocchio
description: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

title: Fantasia
oscars_won_details: Special Award (Walt Disney, William Garity, John N.A. Hawkins for the RCA Manufacturing Company)
Special Award (Leopold Stokowski and his associates)
description: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

title: His Girl Friday
description: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

title: The Shop Around the Corner
description: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

title: The Thief of Bagdad
description: After being tricked and cast out of Bagdad by the evil Jaffar, King Ahmad joins forces with a thief named Abu to reclaim his throne and the woman he loves.

title: The Letter
description: A rubber plantation administrator's wife shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter in her own hand may prove her undoing.

title: Foreign Correspondent
description: On the eve of WWII, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.

title: The Bank Dick
description: A drunken man is accidentally hired as a bank guard, where he ends up becoming involved in a bank robbery.

title: The Sea Hawk
description: Geoffrey Thorpe, a buccaneer, is hired by Queen Elizabeth I to nag the Spanish Armada. The Armada is waiting for the attack on England and Thorpe surprises them with attacks on their galleons where he shows his skills on the sword.

title: Waterloo Bridge
description: A ballet dancer and an army officer meet and fall in love during an air raid on Waterloo Bridge.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Mr. and Mrs. Bennet have five unmarried daughters, and Mrs. Bennet is especially anxious to see them all married to wealthy men.

title: The Mark of Zorro
description: A young Spanish aristocrat must masquerade as a fop in order to maintain his secret identity of Zorro as he restores justice to early California.

title: Kitty Foyle
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A hard-working white-collar girl from a middle-class family falls in love with a wealthy socialite, but their class differences threaten their happiness.

title: All This, and Heaven Too
description: A governess becomes the center of a scandal in 19th-century France when she falls for her employer, the Duc de Praslin.

title: The Long Voyage Home
description: The crew of a merchant ship faces the dangers of the sea and the threat of war as they transport a cargo of explosives.

title: The Westerner
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A drifter wanders into a town controlled by the ruthless Judge Roy Bean and becomes a pawn in a range war between cattlemen and homesteaders.

title: The Great McGinty
description: A bum is recruited by a crooked politician to vote 37 times in an election, starting his rise up the political ladder.

title: Our Town
description: The residents of a small New Hampshire town live out their lives, falling in love, marrying, and dying.

title: Gaslight
description: A woman is slowly driven mad by her husband, who is searching for rubies hidden in their Victorian home.

title: Night Train to Munich
description: A British agent goes undercover to rescue a Czech scientist and his daughter from the Nazis.

title: Remember the Night
description: A shoplifter and her prosecutor fall in love during a Christmas road trip to Indiana.

title: Christmas in July
description: An office clerk mistakenly believes he has won a slogan contest and goes on a spending spree with his girlfriend.

title: My Favorite Wife
description: A woman who was shipwrecked and presumed dead for seven years returns home on the day her husband is remarrying.

title: Dance, Girl, Dance
description: An aspiring ballerina clashes with a burlesque queen as they both pursue their dreams and the same man.

title: The Mortal Storm
description: A German family is torn apart when the Nazis come to power, dividing friends and family members.

title: They Drive by Night
description: Two brothers struggle to make a living as truck drivers, but one brother's accident leads them into a web of murder and deceit involving a trucking magnate's wife.

title: City for Conquest
description: A truck driver becomes a professional boxer to support his brother's musical career, but tragedy strikes in the ring.

title: Santa Fe Trail
description: Jeb Stuart and his friends graduate from West Point and are posted to Fort Leavenworth, Kansas, where they face off against abolitionist John Brown.

title: Northwest Passage
description: Major Rogers leads his Rangers on a dangerous mission to destroy an Indian village during the French and Indian War.

title: Boom Town
description: Two friends strike it rich in the oil business, but their friendship is tested by success and romance.

title: Knute Rockne All American
description: The story of Knute Rockne, Notre Dame's legendary football coach.

title: Abe Lincoln in Illinois
description: A biopic covering the life of Abraham Lincoln from his days as a frontiersman to his election as President of the United States.

title: Road to Singapore
description: Two playboys try to escape romance by traveling to Singapore, but they both fall for the same woman.

title: Strike Up the Band
description: A young drummer and his singer friend try to turn their high school band into a successful swing orchestra.

title: My Little Chickadee
description: A satirical Western about a woman with a past and a man with no future.

title: Torrid Zone
description: A banana plantation owner manipulates a former employee into returning to help save his crops from revolutionaries.

title: Brother Orchid
description: A mobster retires to a monastery to hide from his rivals and discovers a new life of peace and flower growing, until his old life catches up with him.

title: Strange Cargo
description: A group of convicts escapes from a penal colony in French Guiana, accompanied by a mysterious stranger who seems to know everything about them.

title: Go West
description: The Marx Brothers head west to find their fortune and help a young couple retrieve a stolen deed.

title: The Biscuit Eater
description: Two boys try to train a dog that everyone else considers a 'biscuit eater' (a dog who eats but doesn't hunt) to be a champion bird dog.

title: Virginia City
description: A Union officer escapes from a Confederate prison and heads to Virginia City, Nevada to stop a gold shipment intended for the South.

title: Dr. Cyclops
description: A mad scientist working in the South American jungle shrinks his colleagues when they discover his experiments.

title: I Love You Again
description: A boring businessman gets hit on the head and remembers he used to be a con artist, then tries to re-woo his wife who was planning to divorce him.

title: Comrade X
description: An American reporter in Russia is blackmailed into taking a beautiful tram conductor out of the country.

title: Primrose Path
description: A girl from a shanty town tries to hide her family's unsavory background from her new husband.

title: Seven Sinners
description: A cabaret singer in the South Seas causes brawls and falls for a handsome American naval officer.

title: The Blue Bird
description: Two children search for the Blue Bird of Happiness in a fantasy land.

title: One Million B.C.
description: A caveman is banished from his tribe and meets a woman from a more advanced tribe, forcing them to survive prehistoric beasts together.

title: The Ghost Breakers
description: A radio broadcaster helps an heiress investigate a haunted castle she has inherited in Cuba.

title: Contraband
description: A Danish merchant captain becomes involved with a British agent while chasing a German spy ring in London.
